album.title: Greatest Hits
album.artist: Stevie Ray Vaughan and Double Trouble

track.name: Crossfire
comments: The works in the style of blues from Stevie is its own view of the world through music genres embodied in his melodies. Here, impeccable style and philosophical vision. For his work is characterized by a lot of carefully developed parts.
SRV no need to say anymore!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Our (U.S.'s) answer to John Mayall. Did not know much about him until my Rock a Hill Billie co - workers raved about him. I now know why for damn rock'in sure.
wouw - super!

SRV is cool.

SeRVing it up SRV style!
SRV,,,, Texas Pride !!
RIP Stevie.. One of the best that ever lived!
MAGIC... STILL REMEMBER WHERE I WAS WHEN I HEARD ABOUT HIS DEATH.
Soooo Much to LOVE  about SRV and Double Trouble!!! One of his most personal and most powerful tracks! It was his own real vision of where he had been and where wanted to go!! Truly beautiful!!
the bass line is the bomb!
Went to see him the night before he died, Alpine Valley, WI.  Great day, weather, the people, approx 52K.  I thank God that I got to c him again before he needed to take him.....
Sadley missed.
